analyzed: rājan duḥkhāt kurarīṇām iva uccais

analyzed: yathā pūrvam gacchatām pāṇḍavānām

original: 15,022.002a sa rājā rājamārgeṇa nṛnārīsaṃkulena ca

original: 15,022.002c kathaṃ cin niryayau dhīmān vepamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 15,022.003a sa vardhamānadvāreṇa niryayau gajasāhvayāt

original: 15,022.003c visarjayām āsa ca taṃ janaughaṃ sa muhur muhuḥ

original: 15,022.004a vanaṃ gantuṃ ca viduro rājñā saha kṛtakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: vanam gantum ca viduraḥ rājñā saha kṛtakṣaṇaḥ

original: 15,022.004c saṃjayaś ca mahāmātraḥ sūto gāvalgaṇis tathā

original: 15,022.006a nivṛtte pauravarge tu rājā sāntaḥpuras tadā

original: 15,022.006c dhṛtarāṣṭrābhyanujñāto nivartitum iyeṣa saḥ
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭra abhyanujñātaḥ nivartitum iyeṣa saḥ

original: 15,022.007c ahaṃ rājānam anviṣye bhavatī vinivartatām
analyzed: aham rājānam anviṣye bhavatī vinivartatām

analyzed: vadhū parivṛtā rājñi nagaram gantum arhasi

original: 15,022.008c rājā yātv eṣa dharmātmā tapase dhṛtaniścayaḥ
analyzed: rājā yātu eṣa dharma ātmā tapase dhṛta niścayaḥ

original: 15,022.009a ity uktā dharmarājena bāṣpavyākulalocanā
analyzed: iti uktā dharmarājena bāṣpa vyākula locanā

original: 15,022.010a sahadeve mahārāja mā pramādaṃ kṛthāḥ kva cit
analyzed: sahadeve mahā rāja mā pramādam kṛthāḥ kva cit

original: 15,022.010c eṣa mām anurakto hi rājaṃs tvāṃ caiva nityadā
analyzed: eṣa mām anuraktaḥ hi rājan tvām ca eva nityadā

original: 15,022.011a karṇaṃ smarethāḥ satataṃ saṃgrāmeṣv apalāyinam
analyzed: karṇam smarethāḥ satatam saṃgrāmeṣu apalāyinam

original: 15,022.011c avakīrṇo hi sa mayā vīro duṣprajñayā tadā
analyzed: avakīrṇaḥ hi sa mayā vīraḥ duṣprajñayā tadā

original: 15,022.012a āyasaṃ hṛdayaṃ nūnaṃ mandāyā mama putraka

original: 15,022.012c yat sūryajam apaśyantyāḥ śatadhā na vidīryate
analyzed: yat sūryajam a paśyantyāḥ śatadhā na vidīryate

original: 15,022.013a evaṃgate tu kiṃ śakyaṃ mayā kartum ariṃdama
analyzed: evaṃgate tu kim śakyam mayā kartum ariṃdama

original: 15,022.013c mama doṣo 'yam atyarthaṃ khyāpito yan na sūryajaḥ

original: 15,022.013e tannimittaṃ mahābāho dānaṃ dadyās tvam uttamam
analyzed: tad nimittam mahā bāho dānam dadyāḥ tvam uttamam

original: 15,022.014a sadaiva bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdham agrajasyārimardana
analyzed: sadā eva bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdham agrajasya arimardana

original: 15,022.014c draupadyāś ca priye nityaṃ sthātavyam arikarśana

original: 15,022.015c samādheyās tvayā vīra tvayy adya kuladhūr gatā

original: 15,022.016a śvaśrūśvaśurayoḥ pādāñ śuśrūṣantī vane tv aham

original: 15,022.016c gāndhārīsahitā vatsye tāpasī malapaṅkinī
analyzed: gāndhārī sahitā vatsye tāpasī mala paṅkinī

original: 15,022.017a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vaśī

original: 15,022.017c viṣādam agamat tīvraṃ na ca kiṃ cid uvāca ha
analyzed: viṣādam agamat tīvram na ca kim cit uvāca ha

original: 15,022.018a sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 15,022.019a kim idaṃ te vyavasitaṃ naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi

original: 15,022.020c vidurāyā vacobhis tvam asmān na tyaktum arhasi

original: 15,022.022c kṣatradharme sthitiṃ hy uktvā tasyāś calitum icchasi

original: 15,022.023a asmān utsṛjya rājyaṃ ca snuṣāṃ cemāṃ yaśasvinīm

original: 15,022.032c tataḥ pramṛjya sāśrūṇi putrān vacanam abravīt

original: 15,023.001a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi pāṇḍava
analyzed: evam etat mahā bāho yathā vadasi pāṇḍava

original: 15,023.001c kṛtam uddharṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā vaḥ sīdatāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: kṛtam uddharṣaṇam pūrvam mayā vaḥ sīdatām nṛpa

original: 15,023.002a dyūtāpahṛtarājyānāṃ patitānāṃ sukhād api
analyzed: dyūta apahṛta rājyānām patitānām sukhāt api

original: 15,023.002c jñātibhiḥ paribhūtānāṃ kṛtam uddharṣaṇaṃ mayā
analyzed: jñātibhiḥ paribhūtānām kṛtam uddharṣaṇam mayā

original: 15,023.003a kathaṃ pāṇḍor na naśyeta saṃtatiḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: katham pāṇḍoḥ na naśyeta saṃtatiḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 15,023.003c yaśaś ca vo na naśyeta iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam

original: 15,023.004a yūyam indrasamāḥ sarve devatulyaparākramāḥ

original: 15,023.005a kathaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho rājā tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
analyzed: katham dharma bhṛtām śreṣṭhaḥ rājā tvam vāsava upamaḥ

original: 15,023.005c punar vane na duḥkhī syā iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam

original: 15,023.006a nāgāyutasamaprāṇaḥ khyātavikramapauruṣaḥ
15,023.006c nāyaṃ bhīmo 'tyayaṃ gacched iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: na ayam gacchet iti ca uddharṣaṇam kṛtam

original: 15,023.007a bhīmasenād avarajas tathāyaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
analyzed: bhīmasenāt avarajaḥ tathā ayam vāsava upamaḥ

original: 15,023.007c vijayo nāvasīdeta iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: vijayaḥ na avasīdeta iti ca uddharṣaṇam kṛtam

original: 15,023.008a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca tathemau guruvartinau
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca tathā imau guru vartinau

original: 15,023.008c kṣudhā kathaṃ na sīdetām iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: kṣudhā katham na sīdetām iti ca uddharṣaṇam kṛtam

original: 15,023.009a iyaṃ ca bṛhatī śyāmā śrīmaty āyatalocanā
analyzed: iyam ca bṛhatī śyāmā śrīmatī āyata locanā

original: 15,023.009c vṛthā sabhātale kliṣṭā mā bhūd iti ca tat kṛtam
analyzed: vṛthā sabhā tale kliṣṭāḥ mā bhūt iti ca tat kṛtam

original: 15,023.010a prekṣantyā me tadā hīmāṃ vepantīṃ kadalīm iva
analyzed: prekṣantyāḥ me tadā hi imām vepantīm kadalīm iva

original: 15,023.010c strīdharmiṇīm anindyāṅgīṃ tathā dyūtaparājitām
analyzed: strī dharmiṇīm anindya aṅgīm tathā dyūta parājitām

original: 15,023.011a duḥśāsano yadā mauḍhyād dāsīvat paryakarṣata
analyzed: duḥśāsanaḥ yadā mauḍhyāt dāsī vat paryakarṣata

original: 15,023.011c tadaiva viditaṃ mahyaṃ parābhūtam idaṃ kulam
analyzed: tadā eva viditam mahyam parābhūtam idam kulam

original: 15,023.012a viṣaṇṇāḥ kuravaś caiva tadā me śvaśurādayaḥ
analyzed: viṣaṇṇāḥ kuravaḥ ca eva tadā me śvaśura ādayaḥ

original: 15,023.012c yadaiṣā nātham icchantī vyalapat kurarī yathā
analyzed: yadā eṣā nātham icchantī vyalapat kurarī yathā

original: 15,023.013a keśapakṣe parāmṛṣṭā pāpena hatabuddhinā
analyzed: keśa pakṣe parāmṛṣṭā pāpena hatabuddhinā

original: 15,023.013c yadā duḥśāsanenaiṣā tadā muhyāmy ahaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: yadā duḥśāsanena eṣā tadā muhyāmi aham nṛpa

original: 15,023.014a yuṣmattejovivṛddhyarthaṃ mayā hy uddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: yuṣmad tejaḥ vivṛddhi artham mayā hi uddharṣaṇam kṛtam

original: 15,023.014c tadānīṃ vidurāvākyair iti tad vitta putrakāḥ
analyzed: tadānīm vidura a vākyaiḥ iti tat vitta putrakāḥ

original: 15,023.015a kathaṃ na rājavaṃśo 'yaṃ naśyet prāpya sutān mama
analyzed: katham na rāja vaṃśaḥ yam naśyet prāpya sutān mama

original: 15,023.015c pāṇḍor iti mayā putra tasmād uddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: pāṇḍoḥ iti mayā putra tasmāt uddharṣaṇam kṛtam

original: 15,023.016a na tasya putraḥ pautrau vā kuta eva sa pārthiva
analyzed: na tasya putraḥ pautrau vā kutas eva sa pārthiva

original: 15,023.016c labhate sukṛtāṃl lokān yasmād vaṃśaḥ praṇaśyati
analyzed: labhate su kṛtān lokān yasmāt vaṃśaḥ praṇaśyati

original: 15,023.017a bhuktaṃ rājyaphalaṃ putrā bhartur me vipulaṃ purā
analyzed: bhuktam rājya phalam putrāḥ bhartuḥ me vipulam purā

original: 15,023.017c mahādānāni dattāni pītaḥ somo yathāvidhi
analyzed: mahā dānāni dattāni pītaḥ somaḥ yathāvidhi

original: 15,023.018a sāhaṃ nātmaphalārthaṃ vai vāsudevam acūcudam
analyzed: sā aham na ātma phala artham vai vāsudevam acūcudam

original: 15,023.018c vidurāyāḥ pralāpais taiḥ plāvanārthaṃ tu tat kṛtam
analyzed: vidurāyāḥ pralāpaiḥ taiḥ plāvana artham tu tat kṛtam

original: 15,023.019a nāhaṃ rājyaphalaṃ putra kāmaye putranirjitam
analyzed: na aham rājya phalam putra kāmaye putra nirjitam

original: 15,023.019c patilokān ahaṃ puṇyān kāmaye tapasā vibho
analyzed: pati lokān aham puṇyān kāmaye tapasā vibho

original: 15,023.020a śvaśrūśvaśurayoḥ kṛtvā śuśrūṣāṃ vanavāsinoḥ
analyzed: śvaśrū śvaśurayoḥ kṛtvā śuśrūṣām vana vāsinoḥ

original: 15,023.020c tapasā śoṣayiṣyāmi yudhiṣṭhira kalevaram
analyzed: tapasā śoṣayiṣyāmi yudhiṣṭhira kalevaram

original: 15,023.021a nivartasva kuruśreṣṭha bhīmasenādibhiḥ saha
analyzed: nivartasva kuruśreṣṭha bhīmasena ādibhiḥ saha

original: 15,023.021c dharme te dhīyatāṃ buddhir manas te mahad astu ca
analyzed: dharme te dhīyatām buddhiḥ manaḥ te mahat astu ca

original: 15,024.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
analyzed: vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 15,024.001a kuntyās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā pāṇḍavā rājasattama
analyzed: kuntyāḥ tu vacanam śrutvā pāṇḍavāḥ rāja sattama

original: 15,024.001c vrīḍitāḥ saṃnyavartanta pāñcālyā sahitānaghāḥ
analyzed: vrīḍitāḥ saṃnyavartanta pāñcālyā sahita anaghāḥ

original: 15,024.002a tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt sarveṣām eva bhārata
analyzed: tatas śabdaḥ mahān āsīt sarveṣām eva bhārata

original: 15,024.002c antaḥpurāṇāṃ rudatāṃ dṛṣṭvā kuntīṃ tathāgatām
analyzed: antaḥpurāṇām rudatām dṛṣṭvā kuntīm tathāgatām

original: 15,024.003a pradakṣiṇam athāvṛtya rājānaṃ pāṇḍavās tadā
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam atha āvṛtya rājānam pāṇḍavāḥ tadā

original: 15,024.003c abhivādya nyavartanta pṛthāṃ tām anivartya vai
analyzed: abhivādya nyavartanta pṛthām tām a nivartya vai

original: 15,024.004a tato 'bravīn mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro 'mbikāsutaḥ
analyzed: tatas bravīt mahā rājaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ mbikāsutaḥ

original: 15,024.004c gāndhārīṃ viduraṃ caiva samābhāṣya nigṛhya ca
analyzed: gāndhārīm viduram ca eva samābhāṣya nigṛhya ca

original: 15,024.005a yudhiṣṭhirasya jananī devī sādhu nivartyatām
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirasya jananī devī sādhu nivartyatām

original: 15,024.005c yathā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāha tat sarvaṃ satyam eva hi
analyzed: yathā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāha tat sarvam satyam eva hi

original: 15,024.006a putraiśvaryaṃ mahad idam apāsya ca mahāphalam
analyzed: putra aiśvaryam mahat idam apāsya ca mahā phalam

original: 15,024.006c kā nu gacched vanaṃ durgaṃ putrān utsṛjya mūḍhavat
analyzed: kā nu gacchet vanam durgam putrān utsṛjya mūḍha vat

original: 15,024.007a rājyasthayā tapas taptaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ vrataṃ kṛtam
analyzed: rājya sthayā tapaḥ taptam dānam dattam vratam kṛtam

original: 15,024.007c anayā śakyam adyeha śrūyatāṃ ca vaco mama
analyzed: anayā śakyam adyā iha śrūyatām ca vacaḥ mama

original: 15,024.008a gāndhāri parituṣṭo 'smi vadhvāḥ śuśrūṣaṇena vai
analyzed: gāndhāri parituṣṭaḥ smi vadhvāḥ śuśrūṣaṇena vai

original: 15,024.008c tasmāt tvam enāṃ dharmajñe samanujñātum arhasi
analyzed: tasmāt tvam enām dharma jñe samanujñātum arhasi

original: 15,024.009a ity uktā saubaleyī tu rājñā kuntīm uvāca ha
analyzed: iti uktā saubaleyī tu rājñā kuntīm uvāca ha

original: 15,024.009c tat sarvaṃ rājavacanaṃ svaṃ ca vākyaṃ viśeṣavat
analyzed: tat sarvam rāja vacanam svam ca vākyam viśeṣavat

original: 15,024.010a na ca sā vanavāsāya devīṃ kṛtamatiṃ tadā
analyzed: na ca sā vana vāsāya devīm kṛtamatim tadā

original: 15,024.010c śaknoty upāvartayituṃ kuntīṃ dharmaparāṃ satīm
analyzed: śaknoti upāvartayitum kuntīm dharma parām satīm

original: 15,024.011a tasyās tu taṃ sthiraṃ jñātvā vyavasāyaṃ kurustriyaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu tam sthiram jñātvā vyavasāyam kuru striyaḥ

original: 15,024.011c nivṛttāṃś ca kuruśreṣṭhān dṛṣṭvā prarurudus tadā
analyzed: nivṛttān ca kuru śreṣṭhān dṛṣṭvā praruruduḥ tadā

original: 15,024.012a upāvṛtteṣu pārtheṣu sarveṣv antaḥpureṣu ca
analyzed: upāvṛtteṣu pārtheṣu sarveṣu antaḥpureṣu ca

original: 15,024.012c yayau rājā mahāprājño dhṛtarāṣṭro vanaṃ tadā
analyzed: yayau rājā mahā prājñaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ vanam tadā

original: 15,024.013a pāṇḍavā api dīnās te duḥkhaśokaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: pāṇḍavāḥ api dīnāḥ te duḥkha śoka parāyaṇāḥ

original: 15,024.013c yānaiḥ strīsahitāḥ sarve puraṃ praviviśus tadā
analyzed: yānaiḥ strī sahitāḥ sarve puram praviviśuḥ tadā

original: 15,024.014a tad ahṛṣṭam ivākūjaṃ gatotsavam ivābhavat
analyzed: tat a hṛṣṭam iva a kūjam gata utsavam iva abhavat

original: 15,024.014c nagaraṃ hāstinapuraṃ sastrīvṛddhakumārakam
analyzed: nagaram hāstinapuram sa strī vṛddha kumārakam

original: 15,024.015a sarve cāsan nirutsāhāḥ pāṇḍavā jātamanyavaḥ
analyzed: sarve ca āsan nirutsāhāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ jāta manyavaḥ

original: 15,024.015c kuntyā hīnāḥ suduḥkhārtā vatsā iva vinākṛtāḥ
analyzed: kuntyā hīnāḥ su duḥkha ārtāḥ vatsāḥ iva vinākṛtāḥ

original: 15,024.016a dhṛtarāṣṭras tu tenāhnā gatvā sumahad antaram
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ tu tena ahnā gatvā su mahat antaram

original: 15,024.016c tato bhāgīrathītīre nivāsam akarot prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatas bhāgīrathī tīre nivāsam akarot prabhuḥ

original: 15,024.017a prāduṣkṛtā yathānyāyam agnayo vedapāragaiḥ
analyzed: prāduṣkṛtāḥ yathānyāyam agnayaḥ vedapāragaiḥ

original: 15,024.017c vyarājanta dvijaśreṣṭhais tatra tatra tapodhanaiḥ
analyzed: vyarājanta dvijaśreṣṭhaiḥ tatra tatra tapodhanaiḥ

original: 15,024.017e prāduṣkṛtāgnir abhavat sa ca vṛddho narādhipaḥ
analyzed: prāduṣkṛta agniḥ abhavat sa ca vṛddhaḥ narādhipaḥ

original: 15,024.018a sa rājāgnīn paryupāsya hutvā ca vidhivat tadā
analyzed: sa rāja agnīn paryupāsya hutvā ca vidhivat tadā

original: 15,024.018c saṃdhyāgataṃ sahasrāṃśum upātiṣṭhata bhārata
analyzed: saṃdhyā gatam sahasrāṃśum upātiṣṭhata bhārata

original: 15,024.019a viduraḥ saṃjayaś caiva rājñaḥ śayyāṃ kuśais tataḥ
analyzed: viduraḥ saṃjayaḥ ca eva rājñaḥ śayyām kuśaiḥ tatas

original: 15,024.019c cakratuḥ kuruvīrasya gāndhāryāś cāvidūrataḥ
analyzed: cakratuḥ kuru vīrasya gāndhāryāḥ ca avidūrataḥ

original: 15,024.020a gāndhāryāḥ saṃnikarṣe tu niṣasāda kuśeṣv atha
analyzed: gāndhāryāḥ saṃnikarṣe tu niṣasāda kuśeṣu atha

original: 15,024.020c yudhiṣṭhirasya jananī kuntī sādhuvrate sthitā
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirasya jananī kuntī sādhu vrate sthitā

original: 15,024.021a teṣāṃ saṃśravaṇe cāpi niṣedur vidurādayaḥ
analyzed: teṣām saṃśravaṇe ca api niṣeduḥ vidura ādayaḥ

original: 15,024.021c yājakāś ca yathoddeśaṃ dvijā ye cānuyāyinaḥ
analyzed: yājakāḥ ca yathoddeśam dvijāḥ ye ca anuyāyinaḥ

original: 15,024.022a prādhītadvijamukhyā sā saṃprajvālitapāvakā
analyzed: prādhīta dvijamukhyā sā saṃprajvālita pāvakā

original: 15,024.022c babhūva teṣāṃ rajanī brāhmīva prītivardhanī
analyzed: babhūva teṣām rajanī brāhmī iva prīti vardhanī

original: 15,024.023a tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ kṛtapūrvāhṇikakriyāḥ
analyzed: tatas rātryām vyatītāyām kṛta pūrvāhṇika kriyāḥ

original: 15,024.023c hutvāgniṃ vidhivat sarve prayayus te yathākramam
analyzed: hutvā agnim vidhivat sarve prayayuḥ te yathākramam

original: 15,024.023e udaṅmukhā nirīkṣanta upavāsaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: udak mukhāḥ nirīkṣante upavāsa parāyaṇāḥ

original: 15,024.024a sa teṣām atiduḥkho 'bhūn nivāsaḥ prathame 'hani
analyzed: sa teṣām ati duḥkhaḥ bhūt nivāsaḥ prathame hani

original: 15,024.024c śocatāṃ śocyamānānāṃ paurajānapadair janaiḥ
analyzed: śocatām śocyamānānām paura jānapadaiḥ janaiḥ

original: 15,025.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
analyzed: vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 15,025.001a tato bhāgīrathītīre medhye puṇyajanocite
analyzed: tatas bhāgīrathī tīre medhye puṇya jana ucite

original: 15,025.001c nivāsam akarod rājā vidurasya mate sthitaḥ
analyzed: nivāsam akarot rājā vidurasya mate sthitaḥ

original: 15,025.002a tatrainaṃ paryupātiṣṭhan brāhmaṇā rāṣṭravāsinaḥ
analyzed: tatra enam paryupātiṣṭhan brāhmaṇāḥ rāṣṭra vāsinaḥ

original: 15,025.002c kṣatraviṭśūdrasaṃghāś ca bahavo bharatarṣabha
analyzed: kṣatra viś śūdra saṃghāḥ ca bahavaḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: 15,025.003a sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā kathābhir abhinandya tān
analyzed: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ rājā kathābhiḥ abhinandya tān

original: 15,025.003c anujajñe saśiṣyān vai vidhivat pratipūjya ca
analyzed: anujajñe sa śiṣyān vai vidhivat pratipūjya ca

original: 15,025.004a sāyāhne sa mahīpālas tato gaṅgām upetya ha
analyzed: sāyāhne sa mahīpālaḥ tatas gaṅgām upetya ha

original: 15,025.004c cakāra vidhivac chaucaṃ gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
analyzed: cakāra vidhivat śaucam gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī

original: 15,025.005a tathaivānye pṛthak sarve tīrtheṣv āplutya bhārata
analyzed: tathā eva anye pṛthak sarve tīrtheṣu āplutya bhārata

original: 15,025.005c cakruḥ sarvāḥ kriyās tatra puruṣā vidurādayaḥ
analyzed: cakruḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ tatra puruṣāḥ vidura ādayaḥ

original: 15,025.006a kṛtaśaucaṃ tato vṛddhaṃ śvaśuraṃ kuntibhojajā
analyzed: kṛta śaucam tatas vṛddham śvaśuram kuntibhoja jā

original: 15,025.006c gāndhārīṃ ca pṛthā rājan gaṅgātīram upānayat
analyzed: gāndhārīm ca pṛthā rājan gaṅgā tīram upānayat

original: 15,025.007a rājñas tu yājakais tatra kṛto vedīparistaraḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ tu yājakaiḥ tatra kṛtaḥ vedī paristaraḥ

original: 15,025.007c juhāva tatra vahniṃ sa nṛpatiḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
analyzed: juhāva tatra vahnim sa nṛpatiḥ satya saṃgaraḥ

original: 15,025.008a tato bhāgīrathītīrāt kurukṣetraṃ jagāma saḥ
analyzed: tatas bhāgīrathī tīrāt kurukṣetram jagāma saḥ

original: 15,025.008c sānugo nṛpatir vidvān niyataḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: sa anugaḥ nṛpatiḥ vidvān niyataḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: 15,025.009a tatrāśramapadaṃ dhīmān abhigamya sa pārthivaḥ
analyzed: tatra āśrama padam dhīmān abhigamya sa pārthivaḥ

original: 15,025.009c āsasādātha rājarṣiḥ śatayūpaṃ manīṣiṇam
analyzed: āsasāda atha rājarṣiḥ śatayūpam manīṣiṇam

original: 15,025.010a sa hi rājā mahān āsīt kekayeṣu paraṃtapaḥ

original: 15,025.010c sa putraṃ manujaiśvarye niveśya vanam āviśat

original: 15,025.011a tenāsau sahito rājā yayau vyāsāśramaṃ tadā

original: 15,025.011c tatrainaṃ vidhivad rājan pratyagṛhṇāt kurūdvaham
analyzed: tatra enam vidhivat rājan pratyagṛhṇāt kuru udvaham

original: 15,025.012a sa dīkṣāṃ tatra saṃprāpya rājā kauravanandanaḥ
analyzed: sa dīkṣām tatra saṃprāpya rājā kaurava nandanaḥ

original: 15,025.012c śatayūpāśrame tasmin nivāsam akarot tadā
analyzed: śatayūpa āśrame tasmin nivāsam akarot tadā

original: 15,025.013a tasmai sarvaṃ vidhiṃ rājan rājācakhyau mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: tasmai sarvam vidhim rājan rājā ācakhyau mahāmatiḥ

original: 15,025.013c āraṇyakaṃ mahārāja vyāsasyānumate tadā

original: 15,025.014a evaṃ sa tapasā rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro mahāmanāḥ

original: 15,025.014c yojayām āsa cātmānaṃ tāṃś cāpy anucarāṃs tadā

original: 15,025.015a tathaiva devī gāndhārī valkalājinavāsinī
analyzed: tathā eva devī gāndhārī valkala ajina vāsinī

original: 15,025.015c kuntyā saha mahārāja samānavratacāriṇī
analyzed: kuntyā saha mahā rāja samāna vrata cāriṇī

original: 15,025.016a karmaṇā manasā vācā cakṣuṣā cāpi te nṛpa
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā cakṣuṣā ca api te nṛpa

original: 15,025.016c saṃniyamyendriyagrāmam āsthitāḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: saṃniyamya indriya grāmam āsthitāḥ paramam tapaḥ

original: 15,025.017a tvagasthibhūtaḥ pariśuṣkamāṃso;
analyzed: tvac asthi bhūtaḥ pariśuṣka māṃsaḥ

original: jaṭājinī valkalasaṃvṛtāṅgaḥ
15,025.017c sa pārthivas tatra tapaś cacāra;
analyzed: sa pārthivaḥ tatra tapaḥ cacāra

original: maharṣivat tīvram apetadoṣaḥ
analyzed: mahā ṛṣi vat tīvram apeta doṣaḥ

original: 15,025.018a kṣattā ca dharmārthavid agryabuddhiḥ;
analyzed: kṣattā ca dharma artha vid agrya buddhiḥ

original: sasaṃjayas taṃ nṛpatiṃ sadāram
analyzed: sa saṃjayaḥ tam nṛpatim sa dāram

original: 15,025.018c upācarad ghoratapo jitātmā;
analyzed: upācarat ghora tapaḥ jita ātmā

original: tadā kṛśo valkalacīravāsāḥ
analyzed: tadā kṛśaḥ valkala cīra vāsāḥ

original: 15,026.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
analyzed: vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 15,026.001a tatas tasmin muniśreṣṭhā rājānaṃ draṣṭum abhyayuḥ
analyzed: tatas tasmin muni śreṣṭhāḥ rājānam draṣṭum abhyayus

original: 15,026.001c nāradaḥ parvataś caiva devalaś ca mahātapāḥ
analyzed: nāradaḥ parvataḥ ca eva devalaḥ ca mahā tapāḥ

original: 15,026.002a dvaipāyanaḥ saśiṣyaś ca siddhāś cānye manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: dvaipāyanaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ ca siddhāḥ ca anye manīṣiṇaḥ

original: 15,026.002c śatayūpaś ca rājarṣir vṛddhaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ
analyzed: śatayūpaḥ ca rājarṣiḥ vṛddhaḥ parama dhārmikaḥ

original: 15,026.003a teṣāṃ kuntī mahārāja pūjāṃ cakre yathāvidhi
analyzed: teṣām kuntī mahā rāja pūjām cakre yathāvidhi

original: 15,026.003c te cāpi tutuṣus tasyās tāpasāḥ paricaryayā
analyzed: te ca api tutuṣuḥ tasyāḥ tāpasāḥ paricaryayā

original: 15,026.004a tatra dharmyāḥ kathās tāta cakrus te paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatra dharmyāḥ kathāḥ tāta cakruḥ te parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 15,026.004c ramayanto mahātmānaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ janādhipam
analyzed: ramayantaḥ mahātmānam dhṛtarāṣṭram janādhipam

original: 15,026.005a kathāntare tu kasmiṃś cid devarṣir nāradas tadā
analyzed: kathā antare tu kasmin cit deva ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ tadā

original: 15,026.005c kathām imām akathayat sarvapratyakṣadarśivān
analyzed: kathām imām akathayat sarva pratyakṣa darśivān

original: 15,026.006a purā prajāpatisamo rājāsīd akutobhayaḥ
analyzed: purā prajāpati samaḥ rājā āsīt akutobhayaḥ

original: 15,026.006c sahasracitya ity uktaḥ śatayūpapitāmahaḥ
analyzed: sahasracityaḥ iti uktaḥ śatayūpa pitāmahaḥ

original: 15,026.007a sa putre rājyam āsajya jyeṣṭhe paramadhārmike
analyzed: sa putre rājyam āsajya jyeṣṭhe parama dhārmike

original: 15,026.007c sahasracityo dharmātmā praviveśa vanaṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: sahasracityaḥ dharma ātmā praviveśa vanam nṛpaḥ

original: 15,026.007d*0046_01 vanaṃ viveśa dharmātmā śatacityo mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: vanam viveśa dharma ātmā śatacityaḥ mahīpatiḥ

original: 15,026.008a sa gatvā tapasaḥ pāraṃ dīptasya sa narādhipaḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā tapasaḥ pāram dīptasya sa narādhipaḥ

original: 15,026.008c puraṃdarasya saṃsthānaṃ pratipede mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: puraṃdarasya saṃsthānam pratipede mahāmanāḥ

original: 15,026.009a dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ sa bahuśo rājan saṃpatatā mayā
analyzed: dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ sa bahuśas rājan saṃpatatā mayā

original: 15,026.009c mahendrasadane rājā tapasā dagdhakilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: mahā indra sadane rājā tapasā dagdha kilbiṣaḥ

original: 15,026.010a tathā śailālayo rājā bhagadattapitāmahaḥ
analyzed: tathā śailālayaḥ rājā bhagadatta pitāmahaḥ

original: 15,026.010c tapobalenaiva nṛpo mahendrasadanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ balena eva nṛpaḥ mahā indra sadanam gataḥ

original: 15,026.011a tathā pṛṣadhro nāmāsīd rājā vajradharopamaḥ
analyzed: tathā pṛṣadhraḥ nāma āsīt rājā vajradhara upamaḥ

original: 15,047.010a tataḥ sa pṛthivīpālaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa pṛthivīpālaḥ pāṇḍavānām dhuraṃdharaḥ

original: 15,047.010c niryayau saha sodaryaiḥ sadāro bharatarṣabha
analyzed: niryayau saha sodaryaiḥ sa dāraḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: 15,047.011a paurajānapadāś caiva rājabhaktipuraskṛtāḥ
analyzed: paura jānapadāḥ ca eva rāja bhakti puraskṛtāḥ

original: 15,047.011c gaṅgāṃ prajagmur abhito vāsasaikena saṃvṛtāḥ
analyzed: gaṅgām prajagmuḥ abhitas vāsasā ekena saṃvṛtāḥ

original: 15,047.012a tato 'vagāhya salilaṃ sarve te kurupuṃgavāḥ
analyzed: tatas vagāhya salilam sarve te kuru puṃgavāḥ

original: 15,047.012c yuyutsum agrataḥ kṛtvā dadus toyaṃ mahātmane
analyzed: yuyutsum agratas kṛtvā daduḥ toyam mahātmane

original: 15,047.013a gāndhāryāś ca pṛthāyāś ca vidhivan nāmagotrataḥ
analyzed: gāndhāryāḥ ca pṛthāyāḥ ca vidhivat nāma gotrataḥ

original: 15,047.013c śaucaṃ nivartayantas te tatroṣur nagarād bahiḥ
analyzed: śaucam nivartayantaḥ te tatra ūṣuḥ nagarāt bahis

original: 15,047.014a preṣayām āsa sa narān vidhijñān āptakāriṇaḥ
analyzed: preṣayām āsa sa narān vidhi jñān āpta kāriṇaḥ

original: 15,047.014c gaṅgādvāraṃ kuruśreṣṭho yatra dagdho 'bhavan nṛpaḥ
analyzed: gaṅgādvāram kuru śreṣṭhaḥ yatra dagdhaḥ bhavan nṛpaḥ

original: 15,047.015a tatraiva teṣāṃ kulyāni gaṅgādvāre 'nvaśāt tadā
analyzed: tatra eva teṣām kulyāni gaṅgādvāre nu aśāt tadā

original: 15,047.015c kartavyānīti puruṣān dattadeyān mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: kartavyāni iti puruṣān datta deyān mahīpatiḥ

original: 15,047.016a dvādaśe 'hani tebhyaḥ sa kṛtaśauco narādhipaḥ
analyzed: dvādaśe hani tebhyaḥ sa kṛta śaucaḥ narādhipaḥ

original: 15,047.016c dadau śrāddhāni vidhivad dakṣiṇāvanti pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: dadau śrāddhāni vidhivat dakṣiṇāvanti pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 15,047.017a dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ samuddiśya dadau sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭram samuddiśya dadau sa pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: 15,047.017c suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ gāś ca śayyāś ca sumahādhanāḥ
analyzed: suvarṇam rajatam gāḥ ca śayyāḥ ca su mahādhanāḥ

original: 15,047.018a gāndhāryāś caiva tejasvī pṛthāyāś ca pṛthak pṛthak
analyzed: gāndhāryāḥ ca eva tejasvī pṛthāyāḥ ca pṛthak pṛthak

original: 15,047.018b*0102_01 bahūni caiva ratnāni vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
analyzed: bahūni ca eva ratnāni vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca

original: 15,047.018b*0102_02 mahārhāṇi vicitrāṇi dadau kauravanandanaḥ
analyzed: mahārhāṇi vicitrāṇi dadau kaurava nandanaḥ

original: 15,047.018c saṃkīrtya nāmanī rājā dadau dānam anuttamam
analyzed: saṃkīrtya nāmanī rājā dadau dānam anuttamam

original: 15,047.018d*0103_01 saṃkīrtya nāmāni dadau rājan dānāni pārthivaḥ
analyzed: saṃkīrtya nāmāni dadau rājan dānāni pārthivaḥ

original: 15,047.019a yo yad icchati yāvac ca tāvat sa labhate dvijaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ yat icchati yāvat ca tāvat sa labhate dvijaḥ

original: 15,047.019b*0104_01 yāvad icchanti viprās tu tāvanti prāpnuyur dvijāḥ
analyzed: yāvat icchanti viprāḥ tu tāvanti prāpnuyuḥ dvijāḥ

original: 15,047.019c śayanaṃ bhojanaṃ yānaṃ maṇiratnam atho dhanam
analyzed: śayanam bhojanam yānam maṇi ratnam atho dhanam

original: 15,047.020a yānam ācchādanaṃ bhogān dāsīś ca paricārikāḥ
analyzed: yānam ācchādanam bhogān dāsīḥ ca paricārikāḥ

original: 15,047.020c dadau rājā samuddiśya tayor mātror mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: dadau rājā samuddiśya tayoḥ mātroḥ mahīpatiḥ

original: 15,047.021a tataḥ sa pṛthivīpālo dattvā śrāddhāny anekaśaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa pṛthivīpālaḥ dattvā śrāddhāni anekaśas

original: 15,047.021c praviveśa punar dhīmān nagaraṃ vāraṇāhvayam
analyzed: praviveśa punar dhīmān nagaram vāraṇa āhvayam

original: 15,047.021d*0105_01 siktasaṃmārjitapathaṃ patākātoraṇocchritam
analyzed: sikta saṃmārjita patham patākā toraṇa ucchritam

original: 15,047.021d*0105_02 hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ puraṃ teṣāṃ praveśane
analyzed: hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana ākīrṇam puram teṣām praveśane

original: 15,047.022a te cāpi rājavacanāt puruṣā ye gatābhavan
analyzed: te ca api rāja vacanāt puruṣāḥ ye gatāḥ abhavan

original: 15,047.022b*0106_01 dhṛtarāṣṭrasya gāndhāryāḥ kuntyāś cakruś ca saṃghaśaḥ
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya gāndhāryāḥ kuntyāḥ cakruḥ ca saṃghaśas

original: 15,047.022b*0106_02 gaṅgādvāre śubhe puṇye yathoddiṣṭaṃ mahātmanā
analyzed: gaṅgādvāre śubhe puṇye yathā uddiṣṭam mahātmanā

original: 15,047.022c saṃkalpya teṣāṃ kulyāni punaḥ pratyāgamaṃs tataḥ
analyzed: saṃkalpya teṣām kulyāni punar pratyāgaman tatas

original: 15,047.023a mālyair gandhaiś ca vividhaiḥ pūjayitvā yathāvidhi
analyzed: mālyaiḥ gandhaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ pūjayitvā yathāvidhi

original: 15,047.023c kulyāni teṣāṃ saṃyojya tadācakhyur mahīpateḥ
analyzed: kulyāni teṣām saṃyojya tadā ācakhyuḥ mahīpateḥ

original: 15,047.024a samāśvāsya ca rājānaṃ dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
analyzed: samāśvāsya ca rājānam dharma ātmānam yudhiṣṭhiram

original: 15,047.024c nārado 'py agamad rājan paramarṣir yathepsitam
analyzed: nāradaḥ pi agamat rājan parama ṛṣiḥ yathā īpsitam

original: 15,047.024d*0107_01 dvārakāyāṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vāsudevaṃ janārdanam
analyzed: dvārakāyām tatas kṛṣṇam vāsudevam janārdanam

original: 15,047.024d*0107_02 anādinidhanaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam
analyzed: an ādi nidhanam viṣṇum śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: 15,047.024d*0107_03 rahasyakathane yuktaṃ nārāyaṇam anāmayam
analyzed: rahasya kathane yuktam nārāyaṇam anāmayam

original: 15,047.025a evaṃ varṣāṇy atītāni dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: evam varṣāṇi atītāni dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dhīmataḥ

original: 15,047.025c vanavāse tadā trīṇi nagare daśa pañca ca
analyzed: vana vāse tadā trīṇi nagare daśa pañca ca

original: 15,047.026a hataputrasya saṃgrāme dānāni dadataḥ sadā
analyzed: hata putrasya saṃgrāme dānāni dadataḥ sadā

original: 15,047.026c jñātisaṃbandhimitrāṇāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ svajanasya ca
analyzed: jñāti saṃbandhi mitrāṇām bhrātṝṇām sva janasya ca

original: 15,047.027a yudhiṣṭhiras tu nṛpatir nātiprītamanās tadā
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tu nṛpatiḥ na ati prīta manāḥ tadā

original: 15,047.027c dhārayām āsa tad rājyaṃ nihatajñātibāndhavaḥ
analyzed: dhārayām āsa tat rājyam nihata jñāti bāndhavaḥ

original: 15,047.027d*0108_01 tathāśramavāsike tu parvaṇy api samāhitaḥ
analyzed: tathā āśramavāsike tu parvaṇi api samāhitaḥ

original: 15,047.027d*0108_02 gandhamālyādiyuktaṃ ca haviṣyaṃ bhojayed dvijān
analyzed: gandha mālya ādi yuktam ca haviṣyam bhojayet dvijān
